PerformanceSetResourceTimingBufferSize.summary: The setResourceTimingBufferSize() method sets the desired size of the browser's resource timing buffer which stores the "resource" performance entries.

remarks.para: The specification requires the resource timing buffer initially to be 250 or greater.
